SEARCH

Class AccountsMaster

java.lang.Object
AccountsMaster
public class AccountsMaster extends Object
Helper class to the server that handles CRUD operations on accounts and conversations

  • Field Summary

  • Field Details

    • PASSWORD_FILE

      private final String PASSWORD_FILE
      The constant password/account file path: passwords.txt

    • CONVERSATIONS_FILE

      private final String CONVERSATIONS_FILE
      The constant conversations file path: conversations.txt

    • sellerArrayList

      public static ArrayList<Seller> sellerArrayList
      The sellers registered on the application. Populated from passwords.txt in the constructor

    • customerArrayList

      public static ArrayList<Customer> customerArrayList
      The customers registered on the application. Populated from passwords.txt in the constructor

    • conversationArrayList

      public static ArrayList<Conversation> conversationArrayList
      The conversations created in the application. Populated from conversations.txt in the constructor

  • Constructor Details

    • AccountsMaster

      public AccountsMaster(String passwordFile, String conversationsFile)
      Retrieves data from memory to update sellerArrayList, customerArrayList, and conversationArrayList for use in the program. Inherently calls Seller, Customer, and Conversation constructors.
      Parameters:
      passwordFile - The path to the passwords/accounts
      conversationsFile - The path to the conversations

  • Method Details

    • usernameAlreadyTaken

      public boolean usernameAlreadyTaken(String username)
      Checks if the parameter username has already been taken by other users
      Parameters:
      username - The proposed username
      Returns:
      Returns whether the username has been taken

    • emailAlreadyRegistered

      public boolean emailAlreadyRegistered(String email)
      Checks if the parameter email has already been registered
      Parameters:
      email - The proposed email
      Returns:
      Returns whether the email is already registered

    • fetchAccount

      public User fetchAccount(String usernameOrEmail)
      Fetches a user's account based on the username or email entered. Used when the user logs in.
      Parameters:
      usernameOrEmail - The username or email used to log in
      Returns:
      Returns a User object with the matching username or email

    • createAccount

      public User createAccount(String username, String email, String password, String role)
      Creates a new user account for the user based on user input. Used when creating a new account.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the new user
      email - The email of the new user
      password - The password set by the new user
      role - The role of the new user
      Returns:
      Returns the newly created User

    • deleteAccount

      public void deleteAccount(User deletedUser)
      Deletes the user account by removing the parameter user from sellersArrayList / customersArrayList depending on the role and rewrites passwords.txt without the parameter user's account.
      Parameters:
      deletedUser - The user to be deleted

    • numUnreadConversations

      public int numUnreadConversations(User user)
      Calculates the number of unread conversations for the parameter user. Used when the user logs in.
      Parameters:
      user - The active user who logged in
      Returns:
      Returns the number of unread messages for the parameter user

    • listVisibleConversations

      public ArrayList<Conversation> listVisibleConversations(User user)
      Compiles a list of Conversation objects dependent on the parameter user (e.g. the user will not be able to see conversations if they are in the other user's invisibleUsers list).
      Parameters:
      user - The active user who logged in
      Returns:
      Returns the list of conversations visible to the parameter user

    • getConversationArrayList

      public ArrayList<Conversation> getConversationArrayList()
      Accessor method for ArrayList<Conversation> conversationArrayList
      Returns:
      Returns the conversations created in the application

    • fetchConversation

      public Conversation fetchConversation(Seller seller, Customer customer)
      Fetches a Conversation object that corresponds to the parameter seller and parameter customer.
      Parameters:
      seller - The seller participating in the conversation
      customer - The customer participating in the conversation
      Returns:
      Returns the Conversation corresponding to the parameter seller and parameter customer

    • createConversation

      public Conversation createConversation(Seller seller, Customer customer)
      Creates a new Conversation between the parameter seller and parameter customer. Used when sending messages to a User sharing no conversation history.
      Parameters:
      seller - The seller participating in the conversation
      customer - The customer participating in the conversation
      Returns:
      Returns the newly created Conversation

    • listCustomers

      public ArrayList<Customer> listCustomers(Seller seller)
      Compiles a list of Customer objects dependent on the parameter seller (e.g. the seller will not be able to see a Customer if they are in the Customer's invisibleUsers list).
      Parameters:
      seller - The active seller who logged in
      Returns:
      Returns an ArrayList<Customer> of customers visible to the parameter seller

    • listStores

      public ArrayList<Store> listStores(Customer customer)
      Compiles a list of Store objects dependent on the parameter customer (e.g. the customer will not be able to see a Store if they are in the Store's Seller's invisibleUsers list).
      Parameters:
      customer - The active customer who logged in
      Returns:
      Returns an ArrayList<Store> of stores visible to the parameter customer

    • fetchCustomers

      public ArrayList<Customer> fetchCustomers(String searchKeyword, Seller seller)
      Compiles a list of Customer objects whose username or email String.contains() parameter searchKeyword. It is still dependent on the parameter seller (e.g. the seller will not be able to see a Customer if they are in the Customer's invisibleUsers list).
      Parameters:
      searchKeyword - The search keyword
      seller - The active seller who logged in
      Returns:
      Returns an ArrayList<Customer> of customers visible to the parameter seller based on the keyword

    • fetchSellers

      public ArrayList<Seller> fetchSellers(String searchKeyword, Customer customer)
      Compiles a list of Seller objects whose username or email String.contains() parameter searchKeyword. It is still dependent on the parameter customer (e.g. the customer will not be able to see a Seller if they are in the Seller's invisibleUsers list).
      Parameters:
      searchKeyword - The search keyword
      customer - The active customer who logged in
      Returns:
      Returns an ArrayList<Seller> of sellers visible to the parameter customer based on the keyword

    • replaceStringInFile

      public void replaceStringInFile(String filePath, String oldString, String newString)
      Replaces an old User / Conversation / Message object String its updated String in the file at the provided path. Indirectly used in multiple mutator methods to change values in files for later retrieval of information from memory.
      Parameters:
      filePath - The path to the file where changes are to be made
      oldString - The old object String
      newString - The new object String
